title: I don't like to complain but ...
body:
why are we only allowed 300 friends on our friends list!

 I have just realised that its once again time for me to cull my friends list and I hate having to do this! 
Especially since the change you can change your names with IP, I barely recognise my own brother's account, let alone other friends who I may enjoyed playing with one time.

I don't really expect this could change, so this post is pretty much just a QQ.
QQ.

replies.body: just manage your friends list and you won't have to delete 100's at a time, i find it annoying having more than 20
I'm just sort use to having 50+ online at any given time.

> [{quoted}](name=Skyprus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cLqX324X,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-03-06T00:50:06.561+0000)
>
> I'm just sort use to having 50+ online at any given time.

why, i have 2 or 3 friends i play with regularly and the rest are casual completely unnecessary to have that many

I add different people for an assortment of different reasons;
- RL friends, family, or partner friends 
- Forums/Boards friends
- Duo queues I have made friends with
- Joining LOL groups and making friends through there
- Joining teams 
etc

And I feel bad deleting people, especially when because there's no reason we can't won't play again.

If I ever create a normal or an ARAM, I give everyone not in game a throw, and jump in chat with whoever I get.
I like to keep who I play with diverse, and experience the game with as many people as possible. 

And now I have to cull them again!
do you really need more than that though?

I can't figure how, but I always seem to max.
I guess I'm just really friendly, particularly with Curse. 
I love making duo friends!
When OCE started I was B5, and although I can no longer duo with my friend below S3 I have deleting based on that fact. 

I only culled once or twice on NA, but since then I've tried to become more active within the community.
I tired to tell myself when I switched to OCE that I should be more sparing with my friends.
Yet here am I able to before my 2nd major cull, (I had a mini cull when I left GD).

I guess I should. 
Just need the time... 
I will get onto it eventually.
As long as you keep my two accounts on your list I don't mind. Are you going to be on tonight?

Do I have both?
Remind of the name of your 2nd one :P

I most likely will be one, but I'm I have a list of 7 errands that need to be done after work, prior to recreational time.
There should be two accounts there with the name "Strifer"

they should do it like emails. have a tick box on the names so you don't have to press the same buttons over and over again.
still takes me 10 minutes to cull even though I have less than 30 friends.

also I create friend notes on what their last summoner name was but still. would be nice if they provided that convenience as well.

what do you think rito? up for consideration?

Yes that would make it a lot easier! 
I think they should keep name histories on people account's as well.
So if you click on their profile you can see their old names.
this reminds me of the facebook people who go i have 1000+ friends on facebook but they only talk to like 20 of them.

I can see the parallels.
And I can admit I don't talk to majority of people on the list. 
However on the converse this game is incredibly social and every friend I have on Lol is because we have shared an enjoyable League experince (not limited to in game).
I feel like there's so much potential for great experiences in the future still residing in those friends. 
And now I'm having to pick and choose and I'd rather be all inclusive

the best advice i can give is tell u what i do, just delete the ppl that you do the least amount of activity with, eg longer then 2 months dont talk or play anymore etc.. i understand your view though the limit of friends on the friends list should be larger im sure that they can hold more ppl on the list without it affecting other aspects of the game etc..

you coulddd possibly make a list of all your friends in a notepad file and readd/ cull them when you need but still..

I only play with people I find in blind norms that are nice and cool
on NA I had so many friends I had to delete them and re add them so I could keep playing with them sometimes. could get hectic.
